Description: Responsibilities•Accept the workshop order and check the contents for completion.•Register all accumulated processing times.•Use various checklists to document proper performance of individual work steps.•Analyze workshop materials & details to keep data and quality updated.•Prepare necessary equipment for the workplace.•Perform all maintenance services in accordance with the manufacturer's specifications and in line with the maintenance schedule / computer.•Carry out visual inspections, adjustment operations, changing and filling of operating fluids, and replacing wear parts (e.g. brake linings).•Recognize deviations or unusual wear, initiate add-on work and report to Team Leader.•Reset maintenance systems in accordance with the scope of maintenance.•Exchange or replace defective parts.•Prepare defected part for return in case of reconditioning.Skills

Data.Company Industry: Automotive Repair, Spare Parts, & Support Services
